verbose_text: By contrast, Wang et al demonstrated that the N terminus of ASPP2 binds to Ras, enhancing Ras/Raf/MEK/ERK activation to facilitate oncogene induced senescence; Zeng et al discovered that FOXM1 is upregulated in gastric cancer and that its inhibition led to termination of the cell cycle at the G0/G1 phase, partially dependent on p27 kip1.
evidence: ASPP2 binds to Ras, enhancing Ras/Raf/MEK/ERK
